_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Minetest Server
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: An open source voxel game engine. Play one of our many games, mod a game to your liking, make your own game, or play on a multiplayer server.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Oldegg: ubuntu:18.04
# Minetest Installation Script
cd /mnt/server

# Install installation dependencies
apt update
apt -y install unzip wget
touch test

# Download and prepare the engine
wget -Ominetest.zip https://github.com/niansa/minetest/releases/download/server-0.4.17.1/minetestserver.zip
unzip ./minetest.zip
#rm ./minetest.zip
echo 'name = admin' > ./minetest.conf
chmod a+x ./bin/minetestserver

# Download and prepare the game
cd ./games
wget -Ominetest_game.zip https://github.com/minetest/minetest_game/archive/0.4.17.1.zip
unzip minetest_game.zip
#rm minetest_game.zip
mv minetest_game-0.4.17.1 minetest_game
cd ..
